message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $18,000 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $10,000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $14,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you moving a bit on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
I can see you're serious about the product, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment, but I need to stay above my minimum price. How about $13,500?
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  I'm willing to come up a bit to $12,500 if you can close the deal today.
I can see you're getting close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment, but I need to stay above my minimum price. How about $13,000?
